backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing access-controlled user profiles, push notification subscriptions, radio stream checks, and request logging using http-outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the continuous playback user-intent system to affected frontend files and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summary list describing functionality of various frontend files including hooks, components, and configuration.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DEBUG.md: Notes documenting a rollback to version 99 and listing reverted UI and service worker changes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point defining PWA metadata, icons, theme color, and loading the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme, icons, and shortcuts for launching live playback.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing versioned static asset caching and network-first navigation handling.
frontend/README-verify.md: Short guide explaining how to run the frontend verification script during development.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend.mjs: Node script that validates TypeScript config, background assets, and service worker references before deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing navigation, audio playback state, and user-intent-based recovery logic with integrated hooks.
frontend/src/components/CastControl.tsx: Chromecast control button enabling users to start or stop casting the audio stream with status feedback.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Manages PWA installation prompts and platform-specific guides based on device, browser, and dismissal history.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Displays a fixed bottom navigation bar for switching between home, browse, and settings tabs.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: Compact audio player showing artwork, title marquee, and play/pause controls with click-to-open behavior.
frontend/src/components/player/TrackTitl: Scrolling marquee component for track titles with motion preferences, pause interactions, and measurement-based animation.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: Volume slider synced with an audio element and updates its volume in real time.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: Displays push notification status and subscription controls using a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: Provides a dialog form for submitting song or shoutout requests with validation and backend submission handling.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: Shows a banner prompting users to refresh or reset the app when an update or service worker error occurs.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Implements a share button using the Web Share API with a fallback modal for copying a link.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Card UI displaying show metadata including image, description, genres, and schedule with click handling.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: Visual badge indicating live status with animated ping and icon.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: Small animated pulsing indicator used to show on‑air status.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: Renders styled in-app notifications for live shows, mixes, or tracks with dismiss support.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Mock dataset defining Show interface and sample show entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance based on authenticated identity, invalidating dependent queries when updated.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlbumArtBackground: Empty placeholder file for album‑art background logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: Hook that restores audio playback after visibility, focus, or bfcache lifecycle events when the user expects playback.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundImageDia: Diagnostic hook that verifies background image loading and logs warnings if missing.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: Hook implementing Chromecast session initialization, device availability detection, and media casting management.
frontend/src/hooks/useElementCallbackRef: Provides a stable callback ref and returns the currently mounted DOM element.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Manages a favorite flag synced with localStorage and exposes a toggle function.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardFocusInten: Tracks keyboard navigation intent based on key and pointer events, resetting after inactivity.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarqueeMeasurement: Measures container/text sizes to determine overflow and compute marquee animation properties.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Manages notification permission, detects track/mix/live changes, and triggers deduplicated notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Handles push subscription flow using service workers and stores subscription data via backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for stream URL, availability checks, now-playing data, and request submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Manages service worker registration, update handling, cache reset, and readiness state with detailed error-tolerant logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Provides a countdown timer that pauses audio when time elapses and supports starting or canceling the timer.
frontend/src/hooks/useStreamInterruption: Implements automatic audio stream recovery using retry logic, exponential backoff, and stall/error detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Requests and manages a screen wake lock while active, automatically re-requesting on visibility changes and cleaning up on unmount.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, background styles, responsive helpers, marquee animation, and safe-area utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: Renders a shows browsing screen with genre/day filters and a list of selectable show cards.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: Renders the main live stream screen with playback controls, status indicators, and station header UI. Handles play/pause behavior, loading states, and favorite toggling.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Displays detailed now-playing info with album art, track metadata, volume control, sleep timer, and playback controls. Supports closing the screen and managing a sleep timer overlay.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Provides settings and about page UI with notification controls and a background-image refresh feature. Clears cached background assets and triggers reload on refresh.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: Shows detailed info for a scheduled show, including image, schedule, genres, and description. Allows adding the show to a calendar and displays a reminder placeholder action.
Captures and aggregates early startup errors, determines critical failures, and triggers a recovery overlay if needed. Provides summary utilities for diagnostics reporting.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Utility for safe Google Analytics event tracking with checks for gtag availability. Includes helpers for play, pause, and casting event tracking with metadata.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Generates an .ics calendar file for a show by computing the next show date, formatting timestamps, and triggering a download.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Validates and normalizes artwork URLs, handling relative, protocol‑relative, and absolute HTTPS URLs, returning null if invalid.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params (including from hashes), storing them in sessionStorage, and retrieving persisted values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, screens, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, including feature summaries, pending requests, metadata, and version information.
